day3_Task-4_key4: Apko ish sawal me ek number diya jayega jiske digits ko apko reverse karna hai.
day3_Task-4_key6: Apne program ko test karne ke liye ish input ko dale ke uske output check kare
day3_Task-4_key8: Kisi number se uske last digit ko nikalne ke liye app ushe 10 se divde karke ush digit ko as reminder nikal sakte hai.
